contentrichtext.text: {{Infobox settlement |official_name = Vaggeryd |image_skyline = Stationsmiljo Vaggeryd Smaland.JPG |image_caption = Vaggeryd railway station |pushpin_map = Sweden |pushpin_label_position = |coordinates_region = SE |subdivision_type = [[Country]] |subdivision_name = [[Sweden]] |subdivision_type3 = [[Municipalities of Sweden|Municipality]] |subdivision_name3 = [[Vaggeryd Municipality]] |subdivision_type2 = [[Counties of Sweden|County]] |subdivision_name2 = [[Jönköping County]] |subdivision_type1 = [[Provinces of Sweden|Province]] |subdivision_name1 = [[Småland]] |area_footnotes = <ref name=scb>{{cite web |url=http://www.scb.se/Statistik/MI/MI0810/2010A01/Tatorternami0810tab1_4.xls |title=Tätorternas landareal, folkmängd och invånare per km<sup>2</sup> 2005 och 2010 |date=14 December 2011 |publisher=[[Statistics Sweden]] |language=Swedish |archiveurl=http://www.webcitation.org/64arqC15e |archivedate=10 January 2012 |deadurl=no |accessdate=10 January 2012}}</ref> |area_total_km2 = 4.80 |population_as_of = 31 December 2010 |population_footnotes = <ref name=scb /> |population_total = 4,920 <!-- This is the official figure from Statistics Sweden (Statistiska centralbyrån). --> |population_density_km2 = 1026 |timezone = [[Central European Time|CET]] |utc_offset = +1 |timezone_DST = [[Central European Summer Time|CEST]] |utc_offset_DST = +2 |coordinates_display = display=inline,title |latd=57 |latm=30 |lats= |latNS=N |longd=14 |longm=07 |longs= |longEW=E |website = }} '''Vaggeryd''' is a [[Urban areas in Sweden|locality]] situated in [[Vaggeryd Municipality]], [[Jönköping County]], [[Sweden]] with 4,920 inhabitants in 2010.<ref name=scb /> Together with [[Skillingaryd]] it is the seat of the municipality. Vaggeryd is situated about 10 km north of its co-municipal seat [[Skillingaryd]]. Parts of the municipal administration are located in Vaggeryd. Vaggeryd was originally the seat for multiple furniture manufacturers, most of which have now shut down. == References == {{commons}} {{Reflist}} {{Jönköping-geo-stub}} {{Localities in Vaggeryd Municipality}} {{Jönköping County}} [[Category:Populated places in Jönköping County]] [[Category:Municipal seats of Jönköping County]] [[Category:Swedish municipal seats]]
